anujs

the React16-compat mini library

Elaborate design

Supports all features of React 16, but only 14kb

Backing on React ’s huge biome

Run nearly more than 800 official unit tests and 246 antd unit tests!

Excellent browser compatibility

No pressure to run in IE6-8

A complete set of solutions

Provides powerful status management and routers
